explains: n. 审问，盘问；查询；疑问句

sentences.en: He confessed after four days under interrogation.
sentences.cn: 他在受讯问四天之后招认了。

sentences.en: Police say she was cool and collected during her interrogation.
sentences.cn: 警方说她在接受审讯时冷静而又镇定自若。

sentences.en: It was a classic of interrogation: first the bully, then the kind one who offers sympathy.
sentences.cn: 这是审问的一种典范：开始是欺负人的人，然后那个和善的人再施予同情。
